## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Tests

## Checklist

- [ ] ESLint passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Prettier applied (`npm run format`)
- [ ] Unit/Integration tests added/updated
- [ ] Swagger updated (`/api-docs`)
- [ ] Commits follow conventional style
